lead_paragraph: Rabobank Pensioenfonds has removed more than $500 million from the funds of hedge funds sector, saying it doubts their utility and dislikes their lack of transparency, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Rabobank Pensioenfonds has removed more than $500 million from the troubled funds of hedge funds sector, saying it doubts their utility and dislikes their lack of transparency, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: Rabobank Sours on Funds of Hedge Funds

abstract: Rabobank Pensioenfonds has removed more than $500 million from the troubled funds of hedge funds sector, saying it doubts their utility and dislikes their lack of transparency, The Wall Street Journal reported.
